itunes:title: Episode 851 - Special Guest World Record Weightlifter Chris Duffin
title: Episode 851 - Special Guest World Record Weightlifter Chris Duffin
itunes:author: Tetherball Academy Media
itunes:subtitle: Ross Patterson is joined by record holding weightlifter Chris Duffin to talk about how and why he founded his company Kabuki Strength, his weightlifting records, the substances he was on when he was a professional weight lifter, and what it was like grow...
itunes:summary:
Ross Patterson is joined by record holding weightlifter Chris Duffin to talk about how and why he founded his company Kabuki Strength, his weightlifting records, the substances he was on when he was a professional weight lifter, and what it was like growing up practically homeless in the California woods after his parents decided to leave society behind.
